summary: This test module validates the functionality of the ModelPruning callback in PyTorch Lightning. It defines a lightweight test model and helper utilities, then runs a suite of unit tests covering scenarios such as multiple pruning callbacks, permanent pruning across checkpoints, distributed training strategies (DDP, CPU, spawn), lottery‑ticket‑hypothesis style pruning, and misconfiguration handling.
business_intent: Guarantee that the model pruning feature works correctly and robustly across different training configurations, preventing regressions and ensuring proper integration with checkpointing and distributed strategies.
